name: God Eater Off Shot: Lindow-Hen Twin Pack & Anime Vol. 2
name_original: God Eater Off Shot: Lindow-Hen Twin Pack & Anime Vol. 2
description:
God Eater Off Shot: Lindow-Hen Twin Pack & Anime Vol. 2 is an arcade game developed by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It was originally released in 2015. It was published by Bandai Namco Entertainment.
You can play God Eater Off Shot: Lindow-Hen Twin Pack & Anime Vol. 2 on PlayStation 4.
